name: @paloaltonetworks/pan-cortex-data-lake
description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake client library

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:lib && npm run build:test && npm run build:doc
scripts.build:doc: rm -rf doc && node_modules/typedoc/bin/typedoc --mode file --out doc --excludeNotExported --excludePrivate --readme none --theme markdown --gitRevision master
scripts.clean: rm -rf test && rm -rf lib && rm -rf doc

author: Palo Alto Networks Developer Relations
